user.title: Set up Crestron XSIG
user.description: Configure the port for your Crestron XSIG gateway. Join configuration can be done after setup via the Configure button.

data_description.port: The UDP port for the XSIG gateway (typically 16384)

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use. Please choose a different port or stop the service using it.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This port is already configured. Use a different port for multiple Crestron systems.

init.title: Manage Crestron Joins
init.description: Choose an action to manage your to_joins (HA→Crestron feedback) and from_joins (Crestron→HA scripts).

add_to_join.title: Add to_join (HA → Crestron)
add_to_join.description: Send Home Assistant state to Crestron for feedback. The join will update Crestron whenever the entity state changes.

data_description.join: Join number (e.g., d15 for digital, a10 for analog, s5 for serial)
data_description.attribute: Entity attribute to send (e.g., brightness). Leave blank to send state.
data_description.value_template: Advanced: Jinja2 template for custom value logic

add_from_join.title: Add from_join (Crestron → HA)
add_from_join.description: Run a Home Assistant service when Crestron triggers this join. Useful for button presses and macros.

data_description.join: Join number (e.g., d100 for digital button press)

remove_joins.title: Remove Joins
remove_joins.description: Select one or more joins to remove. The integration will reload after removal.

error.invalid_join_format: Join must be in format: d1-d250, a1-a250, or s1-s250 (e.g., d15, a10, s5)
error.join_already_exists: This join number is already configured. Remove it first or use a different join number.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.
